dataTypes.description: An overall description of a scientific projects. The description will be deposited in to BioStudies.

alias.description: An unique identifier in a submission.

orcid.description: The https://orcid.org identifier of the contact.

firstName.description: The first name of the contact.

middleInitials.description: The middle initial of the contact.

lastName.description: The lat name of the contact.

email.description: The email address of the contact.

phone.description: The phone number of the contact.

fax.description: The fax number of the contact.

pubmedId.description: The identifier of the publication in the PubMed database

doi.description: Digital Object Identifier (doi) of the publication

authors.description: The name of the authors of the publication

journalIssn.description: The ISSN identifier of journal the publication has been published

issue.description: The name of the issue the publication has been published

year.description: The year that the publication has been published

volume.description: The name of the volume the publication has been published

pageInfo.description: The information of the page the publication has been published on

dataTypes.description: Description and metadata of a biological sample. This will be stored in BioSamples.

alias.description: An unique identifier in a submission.

dataTypes.description: A single run of a sequencing machine, part of a sequencing experiment. This associates demultiplexed sequencing data from one run of a machine with a sequencing experiment. BAM, CRAM and FASTQ file formats are acccepted.

validationSchema.title: Submissions Assay Data Schema
validationSchema.description: A base validation assay data schema
validationSchema.author: subs

alias.description: An unique identifier in a submission.

files.description: The list of the associated files.

checksum.description: The calculated checksum of the file.

checksum_method.description: The method type of the checksum calculation.

unencryptedChecksum.description: The unencrypted checksum of the file.

dataTypes.description: Describes the sequencing of a biological sample using a sequencing instrument.

alias.description: An unique identifier in a submission.

library_strategy.description: Define the type of the library strategy

library_source.description: Define the type of the library source

library_selection.description: Define the type of the library selection

library_layout.description: Define the type of the library layout

nominal_sdev.description: Define the paired nominal standard deviation.

dataTypes.description: A description of a scientific study to be archived by the ENA or EVA. It forms part of a project.

alias.description: An unique identifier in a submission.

study_abstract.description: Briefly describes the goals, purpose, and scope of the Study. This need not be listed if it can be inherited from a referenced publication.

study_type.description: Define the type of the study

dataTypes.description: This data type describes the requirements for a variant call.

program.description: Programs used when performing this analysis

pipeline description.description: Textual description of the pipeline used to call the variants.

platform.description: Experimental platform(s) used when generating data used in this analysis

imputation.description: Was imputation used in this analysis?

phasing.description: Was phasing used in this analysis?

dataTypes.description: This data type describes the requirements for an metabolomics study.

validationSchema.title: MetaboLights Study Validation Schema
validationSchema.description: Schema based on rules found in http://isa-specs.readthedocs.io/en/latest/isajson.html#study-schema-json
validationSchema.author: metabolights

alias.description: An unique identifier in a submission.

title.description: A title for the Study. Please use the same title as the first publication

description.description: A brief description of the study aims. Please use the abstract of the publication

factors.description: Experimental Factors that drive this study, e.g. Dose, Collection Time Point, Compound

studyDesignDescriptors.description: The type of study design being employed, Metabolomics/Metabonomics, Lipidomics, Metabolic Footprinting, Metabolic Fingerprinting, Targeted Profiling, Global Profiling.

studyType.description: The type of technology Type used for the study. Example - Metabolomics_LCMS, Metabolomics_GCMS, Metabolomics_ImagingMS, Metabolomics_NMR, Metabolomics_ImagingNMR.

dataTypes.description: This data type describes the protocol requirements for a metabolomics study.

validationSchema.title: MetaboLights Study Protocols
validationSchema.description: Protocols applied for the metabolomics study

dataTypes.description: This data type describes the basic assay definitions for a metabolomics study.

validationSchema.title: MetaboLights Assay Validation Schema
validationSchema.description: Schema based on rules found in http://isa-specs.readthedocs.io/en/latest/isajson.html#assay-schema-json
validationSchema.author: metabolights

alias.description: An unique identifier in a submission.

dataTypes.description: This data type describes the basic assay data requirements for a generic metabolomics assay. The required data includes raw, derived and processed files and the file formats vary for specific techniques-  LC-MS, LC-DAD, GC-MS, GCxGC-MS, GC-FID, DI-MS, FIA-MS, CE-MS, MALDI-MS, MSImaging, NMR

validationSchema.title: Submissions MetaboLights Assay Data Schema
validationSchema.description: A base MetaboLights validation assay data schema
validationSchema.author: metabolights

alias.description: An unique identifier in a submission.

files.description: The list of the associated files.

checksum.description: The calculated checksum of the file.

checksum_method.description: The method type of the checksum calculation.

unencryptedChecksum.description: The unencrypted checksum of the file.
